name: Syzygy (David Lopez Espada)
description:
Run run and run, that's all you have to do, and, well, avoid the walls that would kill you hehe

This game was made for the "Aggressive Combustion Game Jam" and the theme was "based on a title song", and with all the song titles that are out there I just simply took "Run", from Foo Fighters. Yeah, really simple, but an endless run fits really well with that title (ง ͠° ͟ل͜ ͡°)ง

Enjoy it and try to get a good high-score \ (•◡•) /!
